sagittarius.title: The one who seeks
sagittarius.text: Sagittarius is a free spirit, always open to new experiences. She does not like being tied down by anyone, and actively seeks exciting experiences. Even though she seems like a lone wolf, nothing makes her happier than sharing her experiences and happiness with the people she loves.

aries.title: The one who rules
aries.text: Her ability to be admired by everyone without it going straight to her head makes her a staple in anyone’s life. She knows how to be a leader and a friend, finding that perfect balance between the two roles.

taurus.title: The one who strikes your heart
taurus.text: There’s something about the deliberateness in her actions that touch the hearts of many. Whether it’s through romance or just by letting you know that she's your friend ‘til the end, Taurus knows how to make anyone feel special and loved.

gemini.title: The one who shines bright
gemini.text: Gemini might be too intense for some people at first, but there is something about him that intrigues everyone who meets her.She brightens up a room whenever she walks in and when he leaves, you always find yourself missing her.

cancer.title: The one who is full of moons
cancer.text: “A gentle, but fearless leader” is the perfect way to describe Cancer because, just like the moon, she is both soft and romantic, yet bold and a trailblazer.But even if she’s ever-changing (like the moon), she is still as reliable as ever.

leo.title: The one who is made of sunshine
leo.text: Leo acts like the world revolves around her because if people were stars and planets, she would definitely be the Sun.She tends to bring light wherever she goes, making it easy to see why people are so attracted to her.

virgo.title: The one who stands for themselves
virgo.text: Virgo knows that the most reliable person you can trust is yourself, which is why she doesn’t often take the advice of others.Virgo is like an all-knowing person who stands strong and tall because she knows that others look to her as a leader.

libra.title: The one who is filled with love
libra.text: All Libra wants is to make sure everyone in her life is well-loved.He will often go out of her way to take care of and please others, which not only makes her incredibly selfless, but also an amazing friend and partner.

scorpio.title: The one who wins your heart
scorpio.text: Scorpio can be considered erratic and intense to some, but when you really get to know him, she’s nothing but a big softie.Scorpio’s main goal in life is to make sure her friends and family know that they are tremendously important to her.

capricorn.title: The one who climbs higher than anyone else
capricorn.text: Capricorn is always reaching new heights, constantly wanting to learn more and expand her mind.He loves being the person with a wealth of knowledge and, more than that, someone who can share this newfound knowledge with others.

aquarius.title: The one who is made with color
aquarius.text: Aquarius is totally unique and loves it that way. She lives for himself and doesn’t care what anyone thinks of her, which intrigues everyone who knows her.

pisces.title: The one who dreams of the unimaginable
pisces.text: So many people criticize Pisces for always having her head in the clouds, but in reality, she’s only dreaming of bigger things in this life.She sees life through rose-colored glasses and is always looking for ways to make a difference.
